title: Who is responsible for the operation of the Spanish language TV station WADA Channel 43 in Wilmington.  The station has constant problems ranging from no sound and picture to picture freezes that last for days.  Is there a local number you can call to report problems?
text:
WADA is a low-powered television station serving the Wilmington area. The affiliate of Spanish-language television network Estrella TV is owned by DTV America, based in south Florida.



The FCC lists the corporate contact information as



1671 NW 144TH TERRACE

SUITE 106

SUNRISE, FL  33323

(954) 357-0931
